setting.name: interDigitTimeout
setting.label: Inter-DTMF Timeout
setting.description: Time to wait between each dialpad key before interpretting user's request. Cannot be greater than Overall DTMF Timeout

setting.name: overallDigitTimeout
setting.label: Overall DTMF Timeout
setting.description: Total time to wait before interpretting user's request.

setting.name: maxDigits
setting.label: Maximum Number of DTMF tones
setting.description: Maximum number of dialpad keys to accept before interpretting user's request.

group.name: onfail
group.label: Invalid Response
group.description: What to do when there are three invalid responses or when a timeout occurs waiting for a response.

setting.name: transfer
setting.label: Transfer the call
setting.description: Transfer the call to a designated extension. Otherwise the call will be disconnected.

setting.name: transfer-extension
setting.label: Transfer Extension
setting.description: Transfer the user to this extension
